name: Percentage of adrenaline auto-injectors not prescribed by brand
title: Percentage of adrenaline auto-injectors not prescribed by brand
description: The percentage adrenaline auto-injectors that are not prescribed by brand
numerator_short: Adrenaline auto-injectors not prescribed by brand
why_it_matters: Adrenaline auto-injectors should be presccribed by brand. This is to ensure patients receive the auto-injector device that they have been trained to use as injection technique is brand specific.
